Title: The Peak
Plot: Alex and Sammy feel that they have peaked after Alex played the best game of his career. The rest of the team is trapped at the Goat House because of lock-down precautions after last years riot. A job offer to Coach Jon Jon causes tense relations with Coach Daniels.
ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, drug use & content that may offend
GuestStars: James Cade, Omari Newton, Rob Ramsay
